original_text: There was a wall around the great yard. This had three rows of special stones, then a row of cedar beams, and so on. It was like the wall around the yard of the Lord's temple and the entrance room.
korean_text: 또 큰 뜰 주위에는 다듬은 돌 세 켜와 백향목 두꺼운 판자 한 켜를 놓았으니 마치 여호와의 성전 안뜰과 주랑에 놓은 것 같더라

sentences.original_text: There was a wall around the great yard.
This had three rows of special stones,
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 특별한 돌 세 줄로 되어 있었고,

sentences.original_text: then a row of cedar beams,
sentences.korean_translation: 그 다음에 편향 나무 들보 한 줄이 있었고,

sentences.original_text: It was like the wall around the yard of the Lord's temple
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 주님의 성전 뜰 주위의 벽과 같았다.
